org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.AbstractConlet<S>
org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet<UPnPBrowserConlet.UPnPBrowserModel>
org.jgrapes.osgi.webconlet.upnpbrowser.UPnPBrowserConlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<ComponentType>, EventListener, Channel, ComponentType, Eligible, Manager, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
public class UPnPBrowserConlet
extends org.jgrapes.webconsole.base.freemarker.FreeMarkerConlet<UPnPBrowserConlet.UPnPBrowserModel>
implements org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener
A conlet for inspecting the services in an OSGi runtime.
